job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pSelby Jennings is working with a Dallas based investment manager on an incredibly exciting opportunity They are looking to bring on MLData Engineers with a focus on Natural Language Processing and building ML algorithmsppbrppYoud be one of the first hires in their Data Innovation and Insights team giving you the opportunity to take ownership and make a tangible impact on the firm Further details to come upon your applicationppbrppWhat you havepulli15 years of experienceliliStrong programming experience in Python liliExtensive experience in Natural Language ProcessingliliKnowledge of regressions classification algorithms decision trees random forests and neural networksliliData scrubbingcleaning experienceliliKnowledge of data streaming Tensorflow Spark Kafka and AWS are nice to haveliul
